      Take a iterable of Link as String with the corresponding deep level and add each one to the queue.

      Take an URL and process it, take the content and send it to index thru DatabaseIndexer, also get all links in that page and add each to the queue, if not already are there.

        Throws:

      • getAllLinksFrom

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllLinksFrom(java.lang.String url)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Builds a DOM thru the content found in the url, it use Jsoup to accomplish that
        Parameters:
        url - to get all links
        Returns:
        All links found, without repetitions
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - trown if the url is not accessible
